Articles.Content:
Hello,

NasaMission AND Planet Factory 'work' on KSP v24.2.

Unless I missed a boat here...what is going on with NASA mission in KSP90; I am still looking for threads.

I tried NASAMission alone with Squad and no other MODS - doesnt even work; in 24.2 the asteroids come right up and spawn.

My game just came to a screetchin halt ... ugh.

Zeta

I'm having difficulty understanding what you're saying, but you need the NASAmission and Squad folder in the gamedata folder. You might need to update your NASAmission somehow. I'm having no problems with Size 3 parts or asteroids.

PlanetFactory, meanwhile, does not work in 0.90

Hi,

Well - NasaMission doesnt spawn asteroids for me - I made a work around and am starting my REAL missions muhaha ! Also Planet Factory is working in 90; watch my streams !

I did see one asteroid spawn after I manually added some; but after that a few days or more - nothing; something is amiss; I spawned my own in 24.2 and am porting them over once my missions get rolling.

ALSO; PF is NOT adding any memory !! I hope to reverify that now; dont ask me why I honestly think, and have shown once that NASAMission added 1.5 gigs of game RAM; ALSO there is a CACHE issue; when I removed planet factory folder it remained in some kind of memory cache; starting a new game got rid of it; I am now starting with a clean KSP90 in hopes to have a no-memory used workinf Planet Factory harr harr !

I still strongly feel NasaMission is at fault in 90; using only squad and nasamission and MM2.5.8 it wont spawn asteroids; I am running a good system.

Zeta

Zeta
If you are playing a Career-mode game, then you need to upgrade the Tracking Station to level 3 before asteroids will appear.

Hello,

Well...I didnt know that...I will be running Career Mode Simulations soon to check that out...thanks !

Cmdr Zeta
